UIDesignTips.Name: Have a "Center" of the page that contains all necessary components and information
Think of your UI as a vertical stack
Use padding and relative positioning instead of absolute positioning
Use fonts, logos, and colors to make your UI look unique, not designs.
Take Inspiration from other UI's
UIDesignTips.Tip 7: Kind of elaborating on point 4, be observant when you're using apps and see UI designs you like and try to take inspiration from them.

IBMDesignTips.Name: Top Prompts and hints for Front end code Maintenance from a random IBM repository
tips: Use CSS media queries to make the dashboard responsive for different screen sizes.
Add ARIA roles and attributes to improve accessibility for users with disabilities.
Implement error boundaries to handle errors gracefully within the component.
Improve error handling for fetching CSV data.
Generate code to implement focus management using the tabIndex property.
